name: Zip Closure leather bag
description:
Breathtakingly stunning designer inspired tote bag in a rich assortment of colours.Made to high specification with quality lining and stitching,bag has sturdy grab handles,inner zip pockets,inner open side pockets for accessories, and main zip closure.Would be great for that special occasion,or for use as a work,school and everyday bag.

UNBELIEVABLE BARGAIN PRICES!

 Size :113.2''.Wide x 10''. High

*Quality faux leather material

*Gorgeous design

*Main zip closure

*Inner  pocket

*Open inner pocket

*Grab handle

*Great quality

*There may be slight colour variations between the photographs and the  bag due to lighting.

name: Cheetah print shawls
description:
Beautiful Pashmina Shawls - Cheetah print pashmina in classy black and white - 4 way print pashmina 
Leopard, polkadot and check wear it different every time. And Gorgeous snow leopard print pashmina with border. And Loud vibrant zebra print pashmina in purple.


For the 3 for £14 offer please buy it first and we would email you details of what you want InShAllah.

name: Plain Pashmina Scarfs
description:
• Made from 100% viscose which is soft, light, affordable and long lasting.
    • Perfect for all seasons
    • A must have for occasions like weddings, birthdays, anniversaries etc.
    • Compliment any outfit from your wardrobe.

- Want 4 for £10? Add the 4 for £10 option and we would email and ask you what colours you would like. 

Massive range of more than 50 beautiful and fashionable colours
Ideal for any season whether it is winter or summer
Scarf is very light and soft to touch (viscose material)
Measurements: 70 inches x 27 inches (175 cm x 70 cm)



Please note: Actual product colours may differ slightly from the pictures in this listing. This is due to lighting variations during photography and computer screen. If you are unsure please contact us through KIK messaging system before buying.

name: Dotted Hijab Headscarf
description:
A scarf made of super soft cotton like fabric -  In a polka dot block print through out in complementary colours

NEW for summer 2013 A delicate fabric thats light & airy -  team up with a plain maxi dress or some denim to bring out the print

Available in 4 colours

SIZE: approx 42 x 70"
